column2: Missing or Non-Descriptive ALT Text on Product Images
column3: Product images lack descriptive alt text for accessibility and SEO
column4: 1. Open Home or Products page 2. Inspect elements
column5: Every product image should include descriptive alt text for accessibility and SEO
column6: Several product images have empty or missing alt attributes
column10: Windows 10, Chrome 142 / Edge 129 / Firefox 131, Web App (latest live version)

column2: Footer Grammar Errors and Outdated Year
column3: Footer text has grammar errors and shows outdated copyright year
column4: 1. Scroll to footer 2. Read subscription text and copyright year
column5: Proper grammar and current year, e.g., 'Stay updated with our latest news. © 2025 Automation Exercise.'
column6: Text reads 'be updated your self...' and copyright shows 2021
column10: Windows 10, Chrome 142 / Edge 129 / Firefox 131, Web App (latest live version)

column2: Currency Symbol Not Localized (“Rs.” Shown for All Users)
column3: Product prices always show Rs. regardless of user region
column4: 1. Visit Home or Products page 2. Observe product price labels
column5: Currency should match user region or display clear code (e.g., USD, EGP)
column6: All prices use 'Rs.' even for users outside India
column10: Windows 10, Chrome 142 / Edge 129 / Firefox 131, Web App (latest live version)

column3: Products are duplicated in Home and All Products pages
column4: 1. Open Home or Products page 2. Scroll through product listings
column5: Each product should appear only once in the list/grid
column6: Each product appears twice with identical info and Add to cart button

column2: Recommended Items Section Missing View Product Button
column3: Recommended items section lacks 'View Product' button
column4: 1. Scroll to Home page bottom 2. Hover over recommended items
column5: View Product button should appear as in main product listings
